title: Chinese pork potsticker dumplings
description: Dumpling dough is so easy to make and tastes infinitely better. Fill them with your favourite meats, veg or fish for a Sunday treat.
ingredients: 140g/5oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/3oz Chinese leaves or spinach, finely chopped
½ tbsp Shaoxing rice wine (or dry sherry if none is available)
1 tbsp cold chicken stock or water
